"Run this test if you're experiencing issues with message ordering (date/time).
The test fetches a number of messages from the server and records their dates.
It does not record your login, password, or actual message contents."

"Message date test in progress…
%1$d messages processed, limit is %2$d."

"Unable to check license state. Tap here to confirm your license."
"If you've already purchased an unlocker, make sure to download and run it."
Some devices need to be rebooted for the change to take effect
To add more than two accounts, to use mail identities, and to remove the promo signature, purchase the Pro version unlocker on Google Play.
You can purchase the AquaMail Pro key on Google Play.
AquaMail Pro unlocker key is not installed.
"The free version is limited to two accounts. Touch here to learn more."
"To add more than two accounts, to use mail identities, and to remove the promo signature, purchase the Pro version unlocker at the developer's web site."
"You can purchase the AquaMail Pro key at the developer's web site."
To add more than two accounts, to use mail identities, and to remove the promo signature, install the 3CX Mobile Device Manager from Google Play and authenticate it with the management server.
3CX MDM is not authenticated with its management server.
Please authenticate 3CX Mobile Device Manager with its management server.
You can install the 3CX Mobile Device Manager from Google Play.
The device may need to be restarted for this change to take effect.
